property.name: archive.max.number.of.threads
property.description: Set the maximum number of threads running for archiving (for a parallel job).

property.name: ats.ctc.host
property.description: CTC host, provided by CATS used to create coverage measurement reports. MON.sym files are copied to this location, for example "10.0.0.1". If not given, code coverage reports are not created

property.name: ats.testrun.name
property.description: Modify the test-run name if you have understanding of test.xml file or leave it as it is. Default value is a string consist of build id, product name, major and minor versions

property.name: ats.plan.name
property.description: Modify the plan name if you have understanding of test.xml file or leave it as it is. Default value is "plan"

property.name: ats.trace.enabled
property.description: Should be "True" if tracing is needed during the tests running on ATS3. Default value is "False", the values are case-sensitive.

property.name: ats.ctc.enabled
property.description: Should be "True" if coverage measurement and dynamic analysis (CTC) tool support is to be used by ATS. Default value is "False", the values are case-sensitive.

property.name: ats.email.list
property.description: The property is needed if you want to get an email from ATS server after the tests are executed. There can be one to many semicolon(s) ";" separated email addresses.

property.name: ats.aste.email.list
property.description: The property is needed if you want to get an email from ATS server after the tests are executed. There can be one to many semicolon(s) ";" separated email addresses.

property.name: ats.flashfiles.minlimit
property.description: Limit of minimum number of flash files to execute ats-test target, otherwise ATSDrop.zip will not be generated. Default value is "2" files.

property.name: ats.sisfiles.minlimit
property.description: Limit of minimum number of sis files to execute matti-test target, otherwise MATTI-drop.zip will not be generated. Default value is "1" files.

property.name: ats.target.platform
property.description: Sets target platform for compiling test components. Default value is "armv5 urel".

property.name: ats.test.timeout
property.description: To set test commands execution time limit on ATS3 server, in seconds. Default value is "60".

property.name: ats.product.hwid
property.description: Product HardWare ID (HWID) attached to ATS. By default the value of HWID is not set.

property.name: ats.obey.pkgfiles.rule
property.description: If the property is set to "True", then the only test components which will have PKG files, will be included into the test.xml as a test-set. Which means, even if there's a test component (executable) but there's no PKG file, it should not be considered as a test component and hence not included into the test.xml as a separate test. By default the property value is False.

property.name: tsrc.data.dir
property.description: The default value is "data" and refers to the 'data' directory under 'tsrc' directory.

property.name: tsrc.path.list
property.description: Contains list of the tsrc directories. Gets the list from system definition layer files. Assuming that the test components are defined already in te layers.sysdef.xml files to get compiled. Not recommended, but the property value can be set if there are no system definition file(s), and tsrc directories paths to set manually.

property.name: ats.flash.images
property.description: List of flash images (.fpsx files) to install on the phone. It is not recommended to set the value manually however, it is possible.

property.name: ats.report.location
property.description: Sets ATS reports store location. Default location is "${publish.dir}/${publish.subdir}"

property.name: ats.drop.file
property.description: Path for creation of the drop file during the build. Default is ATS3Drop.zip

property.name: ats.aste.drop.file
property.description: Path for creation of the drop file during the build. Default is ATS3AsteDrop.zip

property.name: ats.drops.count
property.description: ATSDrop files counter. Value is set to have total number of ATSDrops.

property.name: ats.product.name
property.description: Name of the product to be tested. For example: "PRODUCT"

property.name: ats.script.type
property.description: There are two types of ats script files to send drop to ATS server, "runx" and "import"; only difference is that with "import" ATS doesn't have to have access rights to testdrop.zip file, as it is sent to the system over http and import doesn't need network shares. If that is not needed "import" should not be used. Default value is "runx" as "import" involves heavy processing on ATS server

property.name: ats.drop.location
property.description: Server location (UNC path) to save the ATS3Drop file, before sending to the ATS. For example: \\trwsem00\some_folder\. In case, ``ats.script.type`` is set to "import", ATS doesn't need to have access to ats.drop.location, its value can be any local folder on build machine, for example c:\temp (no network share needed).

property.name: ats.aste.testrun.name
property.description: Modify the test-run name if you have understanding of test.xml file or leave it as it is. Default value is a string consist of build id, product name, major and minor versions

property.name: ats.aste.plan.name
property.description: Modify the plan name if you have understanding of test.xml file or leave it as it is. Default value is "plan"

property.name: ats.evalid.pre
property.description: Temp dir

property.name: ats.evalid.post
property.description: Temp dir

property.name: disable.analysis.tool
property.description: Set this property to disable Analysis Tool. By default Analysis Tool will run with every build and send api metrics to diamonds but Analysis Tools takes time.

property.name: drop.file.counter
property.description: Drop package file counter. Updates its value automatically when a new drop file is created for ATS.

property.name: ido.build.filter
property.description: Property is used to define ido build filters in the configuration file.

property.name: ats.server
property.description: For example: "4fio00105" or "catstresrv001.cats.noklab.net:80". Default server port is "8080", but it is not allowed between intra and Noklab. Because of this we need to define server port as 80. The host can be different depending on site and/or product.

property.name: ats.password
property.description: Password for ATS. This password might be different from NOE or HTTP/UNIX password.

property.name: ats.username
property.description: Username for ATS server. This is NOT the NOE or HTTP/UNIX username.

property.name: eunit.test.package
property.description: The EUnit package name to be unzipped on the environment, for executing EUnit tests.

property.name: eunitexerunner.flags
property.description: Flags for EUnit exerunner can be set by setting the value of this variable. The default flags are set to "/E S60AppEnv /R Off".

property.name: cache.dir
property.description: Root directory where Helium can store files on a temporary basis for a user.

property.name: log4j.cache.dir
property.description: Log directory for log4j.

property.name: build.cache.dir
property.description: Directory where Helium can store files on a temporary basis for a user per build.

property.name: build.cache.log.dir
property.description: Directory where Helium can store log files on a temporary basis for a user per build.

property.name: build.duplicates.log
property.description: Default name of the build duplicates log file.

property.name: build.version
property.description: Version of the build.

property.name: build.drive
property.description: Substed drive where the build is performed. if not defined then helium should search next available build drive letter and subst autometically

property.name: unsubst.after.build
property.description: Unsubsted drive after build finished. If not defined then helium should left the drive as subst. Set the value as "yes" if you want to unsubst after build finished.

property.name: build.id
property.description: A unique ID for the build.

property.name: zip.wa.file
property.description: A unique name for the WA Sources ZIP file.

property.name: binary.root
property.description: Defines location of binaries created in build. Used in check-capability target while generating capability scan report.

property.name: build.log
property.description: Defines name of the log file.

property.name: build.log.dir
property.description: This is where the build logs are stored.

property.name: archive.log.dir
property.description: This is where the archive logs are stored.

property.name: compile.log.dir
property.description: This is where the compile logs are stored.

property.name: post.log.dir
property.description: This is where the post build logs are stored.

property.name: prep.log.dir
property.description: This is where the preparation build logs are stored.

property.name: test.log.dir
property.description: This is where the ats test logs are stored.

property.name: localisation.log.dir
property.description: This is where the localisation logs are stored.

property.name: roms.log.dir
property.description: This is where the roms logs are stored.

property.name: diamonds.build.output.dir
property.description: This is where the diamonds output XML files are stored.

property.name: build.signal.status.dir
property.description: This is where the signal related files are stored.

property.name: build.status.email.template
property.description: This is the email template path where it updates the build status based on metadata database contents. The default file could (email_status.html.ftl under tools\common\template\log)be used as the base and any additional info could be added

property.name: build.name
property.description: A general label for this type of build. Currently if not defined, product.name will be used to set this property, but this will likely be removed in future.

property.name: build.output.dir
property.description: This is the directory where build output is placed.

property.name: build.property.cache.file
property.description: A file where persistent properties for a build should be stored.

property.name: build.sisfiles.dir
property.description: This is the directory where sisfiles are placed.

property.name: build.summary.file
property.description: This is the file where build summary is stored.

property.name: build.system
property.description: This specifies which build system is used. Default for this is ebs You can use ec for Electric Cloud..

property.name: build.system.ebs
property.description: Defined if build.system is set to "ebs", which is the default.

property.name: schema.new
property.description: enabling / disabling the new schema (schema 3.0).

property.name: build.system.sbs
property.description: Defined if ${build.system} is set to "sbs".

property.name: build.temp.dir
property.description: A directory for storing temporary build files.

property.name: build.type
property.description: The general type of the build. This is used for checking the tools environment. Potential values include core, ido, product.

property.name: build.errors.limit
property.description: Maximum allowable errors in a build.

property.name: canonical.sysdef.file
property.description: The path of the generated canonical System Definition file that contains all the input System Definition file content.

property.name: ccm.base.dir
property.description: Directory where CCM operations will be performed.

property.name: ccm.home.dir
property.description: Home directory of CCM operations.

property.name: ccm.database
property.description: Name of the CCM database to use. No default value.

property.name: ccm.cache.xml
property.description: Location of the cache.xml file which enables global synergy sessions.

property.name: ccm.database.path
property.description: Path of the CCM database. No default value

property.name: ccm.enabled
property.description: Defines that property if you want the ccm-get-input step to be run during the build area preparation.

property.name: ccm.engine.host
property.description: Engine host of CCM database. No default value.

property.name: ccm.user.login
property.description: Contains the user name for CCM by reading the information from .netrc file.

property.name: ccm.user.password
property.description: Contains the password for CCM user name by reading the information from .netrc file.

property.name: ccmgetinput
property.description: To check which ccmgetinput helium will be use

property.name: ccmtask.python.script.file
property.description: The path for the Python script to handle the ccm task bridge to the ccm.py module.

property.name: cmaker.component.dir
property.description: Location of the cmaker component to install it.

property.name: cmaker.config.dir
property.description: Directory where to execute cMaker.

property.name: cmaker.log.label
property.description: Custom label added to the cmaker logs.

property.name: cmaker.pp.version
property.description: Version of PP(NCP) configuration to be exported

property.name: cmaker.s60.version
property.description: Version of S60(require cmaker.pp.version to be set) configuration to be exported

property.name: current.env.config
property.description: Internal property used for environment setting in the beginning of the build.

property.name: ctool.dir
property.description: Location of the configuration tool.

property.name: ctool.western.conf
property.description: configuration for the western variant.

property.name: ctool.china.conf
property.description: configuration for the chinese variant.

property.name: ctool.japan.conf
property.description: configuration for the japanese variant.

property.name: data.model.file
property.description: The data model XML file for the Ant configuration.

property.name: data.model.parsed
property.description: The data model XML file for the Ant configuration parsed.

property.name: delta.ant.file
property.description: Temp file

property.name: delta.zip.delete.file
property.description: Special Instructions file for SymDEC

property.name: delta.zip.file
property.description: The zip file

property.name: delta.zip.location
property.description: Output location

property.name: delta.zip.temp.location
property.description: Temp location

property.name: delta.zip.file.size
property.description: Define the file size of the zipped up released file, this is then used by delta zipping code to determine if a delta zip is required or a full zip should be created. The delta zip will only be published if it is less than 1/2 the size of this property

property.name: diamonds.compile.summary
property.description: Compilation summary file for diamonds.

property.name: diamonds.listener.configuration.file
property.description: Diamonds Configuration file with full path used for diamonds listener.

property.name: antlib.import.module.path
property.description: Path where ant XML files dynamically downloaded from jar file.

property.name: diamonds.build.id
property.description: The ID assigned to the build by the Diamonds server.

property.name: diamonds.build.url
property.description: The full URL to the build entry on the Diamonds server.

property.name: diamonds.host
property.description: Diamonds server's host address.

property.name: diamonds.path
property.description: Diamonds server build location.

property.name: diamonds.port
property.description: Diamonds server port number.

property.name: diamonds.mail
property.description: Email address of diamonds server.

property.name: diamonds.schema
property.description: Diamonds rest api schema.

property.name: documentation.host
property.description: The host server where the Helium documentation is stored.

property.name: documentation.path.root
property.description: The root of the path on the host server where the Helium documentation is stored.

property.name: documentation.path
property.description: The full path on the host server where the Helium documentation is stored.

property.name: diamonds.target.list.to.log
property.description: List of targets that should be logged in to Diamonds.

property.name: exceptions.target
property.description: target to be executed in case of exceptions (mainly to generate the summary and raise signal).

property.name: documentation.url.root
property.description: Root location of the Helium release documentation.

property.name: log.target
property.description: Enables logging of the start and end of individual targets.

property.name: log4j.configuration
property.description: Defines the path to log4j configuration.

property.name: call.cleanup
property.description: Ensures the cleanup-all target is called when the build finishes.

property.name: sbs.inputs.list
property.description: list of , separated input list, and each entry from list is arguments for sbs call.

property.name: skip.sbs.parser.exception
property.description: to skip the exception and continue the build during log parsing for raptor

property.name: sbs.config
property.description: Configurations for which the components to be built(armv5,winscw)

property.name: skip.sbs.layer.generation
property.description: skip sbs layer filtering (true) for new schema and false for schema 1.4.0

property.name: ec.allow.duplicates
property.description: Setting this to "1" will force xml2mak to generate only warnings (instead of errors) for duplicate components in the component list

property.name: ec.emake
property.description: Location of emake tool.

property.name: ec.history.dir
property.description: This specifies the directory where Electric Cloud history files are stored. Currently defined in helium.ant.xml and mapped related to publish.root.dir

property.name: ec.historyfile
property.description: Temporary location of the EC history file used by the current build.

property.name: ec.makefile.file
property.description: Location of the Makefile generated to run the EC build.

property.name: ec.maxagents
property.description: Maximum number of agent to be used

property.name: ec.history.option
property.description: Should be create for single node build and merge for multi node build.

property.name: ec.mode
property.description: mode is either serial / parallel - default is parallel

property.name: week.number
property.description: this is used to identify the history files based on releases

property.name: branch.name
property.description: this along with week.number used to find proper history file based on releases.

property.name: ec.sysdef2make
property.description: Location of sysdef2make.pl file, which is used to translate system definition files to make files. Internal property that normally does not require changes.

property.name: ec.sysdef2make.cmdline
property.description: Extra command line parameters for the sysdef2make call.

property.name: email.ldap.server
property.description: Network address of the LDAP server.

property.name: ldap.organization.unit.rootdn
property.description: Organization root DN for LDAP server.

property.name: ldap.people.rootdn
property.description: People root DN for LDAP server.

property.name: email.ldap.rootdn
property.description: Root distinguished name of the LDAP server.

property.name: email.smtp.server
property.description: Network address of the SMTP server.

property.name: skip.ats.sending
property.description: Skips sending drop package file to ATS/ASTE after its creation.

property.name: skip.build.duplicates
property.description: This allow you to skip the build duplciates log generation.

property.name: skip.codescanner
property.description: Skip the codescanner target if true (true/yes/on).

property.name: skip.policy-validation
property.description: Skip the policy validation target if true (true/yes/on).

property.name: codescanner.config
property.description: Defines the location of a custom configuration for codescanner.

property.name: codescanner.format
property.description: Defines the format of Codescanner output (html|xml|std).

property.name: codescanner.log.unique
property.description: Defines if the folder for Codescanner output is unique (on|off).

property.name: file-comparison.bcomp_path
property.description: Defines the location of BComp.exe.

property.name: file-comparison.bcomp_conf
property.description: Defines the location of Beyond Compare configuration file.

property.name: file-comparison.left_side
property.description: The fileset id used on the left side of comparison.

property.name: file-comparison.right_side
property.description: The fileset id used on the right side of comparison.

property.name: file-comparison.output
property.description: Defines the location where comparison output should be put.

property.name: file-comparison.left_name
property.description: Defines the name of the folder for the left side of comparison.

property.name: file-comparison.right_name
property.description: Defines the name of the folder for the right side of comparison.

property.name: file-comparison.regexp.from
property.description: Defines the regexp pattern (in ANT-pattern style) which to mach from given filesets.

property.name: file-comparison.regexp.to
property.description: Defines the regexp pattern (in ANT-pattern style) what to use in (possible) replacement.

property.name: skip.compile-ec-patch
property.description: If defined it skips the buildtools emake patching.

property.name: epocroot
property.description: epocroot path

property.name: ext.java.lib.dir
property.description: External ant library path

property.name: genxml.output.file
property.description: Path for the output XML file generated by genxml used as input to EBS or EC.

property.name: genxml.output.file.suffix
property.description: Suffix used in genxml related output files. This value is added into file names to show that they are genxml related. Used in log files, genxml output files and component list for EE images. Normally does not need to be set.

property.name: helium.build.dir
property.description: The path where Helium-specific outputs are written to.

property.name: helium.doc.dir
property.description: Location of helium doc src.

property.name: helium.ccm.workarea.dir
property.description: The path to a Synergy work area used for updating Helium releases.

property.name: helium.svn.url
property.description: SVN URL where to find Helium.

property.name: helium.java.lib.dir
property.description: helium java library location

property.name: helium.svn.workarea.dir
property.description: The path to a Subversion work area used for updating Helium releases.

property.name: helium.dir
property.description: Defines the logical path to the helium directory used to start a build.

property.name: helium.version
property.description: Contains Helium version information

property.name: helium.revision
property.description: Contains Helium version information

property.name: ido.codescanner.config
property.description: Defines the location of a custom configuration for codescanner.

property.name: ido.codescanner.output.dir
property.description: Defines the location of Codescanner output.

property.name: ido.codescanner.output.type
property.description: Defines the format of Codescanner output (html|xml|std).

property.name: ido.keep.old
property.description: Once define this property will enable the backup of old ado before doing the copy.

property.name: ido.template.robot.ready
property.description: Location of the ready.txt FMPP template (override that property if you want to customize the content).

property.name: robot.email.to
property.description: Comma seperated list of email address.

property.name: imaker.command
property.description: The path to the iMaker executable file.

property.name: imaker.engine
property.description: Defines which accelerator to use for running iMaker. (default value from build.system property)

property.name: imaker.fmpp.ant
property.description: Location of the Ant iMaker execution template.

property.name: imaker.fmpp.makefile
property.description: Location of the EC iMaker execution template.

property.name: tools.ivy.config.file
property.description: The tools dependencies Ivy settings configuration file.

property.name: log.build.build_id
property.description: Diamonds logging information.

property.name: log.build.category
property.description: Diamonds logging information.

property.name: log.build.computer
property.description: Diamonds logging information.

property.name: log.build.user
property.description: Diamonds logging information.

property.name: md5.signature.file
property.description: Output location of md5 file

property.name: md5.split
property.description: Number of partial md5 files to use during creation

property.name: old.md5.file.present
property.description: Is a previous builds md5 being passed manually

property.name: old.bom.log.publish.dir
property.description: Publish dir location of the old bom log.

property.name: metadata.db.file
property.description: The path to the SQLite metadata database file.

property.name: exclude.test.layers
property.description: Comma seperated excluded test layers. The test components (mentioned in the excluded test layers) will not be included in the ATS test drops

property.name: delta.exclude.commasep
property.description: Comma seperated excluded directories from the zip

property.name: old.md5.file
property.description: A previous builds md5

property.name: number.of.threads
property.description: how many parallel threads can run

property.name: parse_abld_what.tool
property.description: Location of the parse_what_log.pl tool.

property.name: prep.root.dir
property.description: The directory where new build area directories are created and substed to the build drive.

property.name: qmake.enabled
property.description: If defined the qmake stage will be enabled during compilation.

property.name: qt.qmake.ant.template
property.description: The location of the ant template to run qmake commands.

property.name: qt.qmake.makefile.template
property.description: The location of the makefile template to run qmake commands.

property.name: qt.configure.args
property.description: The command lines argument passed to the configure tool.

property.name: qt.qmake.default.args
property.description: Setting default arguments to qMake command line, if the qmakeArgs is defined from the system definition file then those arguments are discarded.

property.name: absolute.prep.root.dir
property.description: This will convert absolute path for prep.root.dir if anybody use relative path.

property.name: prep.build.dir
property.description: This is the directory where the build area is prepared. Once created it is substed to the build.drive.

property.name: prep.delivery.modificationset
property.description: Location where the XML modificationset file should be generated. If not defined the file is not generated. (Usefull for CI systems)

property.name: publish.dir
property.description: Directory where the build is published (includes build.id)

property.name: publish.ccm.folder
property.description: Synergy folder where you want your task to be published.

property.name: publish.base.dir
property.description: Directory where all builds are published. Same as publish.dir but without build.id at the end

property.name: publish.fileset.ids
property.description: The fileset id which will be upload

property.name: publish.release.subdir
property.description: Subdir part of the publish release dir, relative to publish.root.dir

property.name: publish.release.dir
property.description: The directory where the release of this build is published to on the local network.

property.name: release.images.dir
property.description: The directory where flash images of build can be found

property.name: releasenotes.output
property.description: Location of output rtf file

property.name: releasenotes.output.dir
property.description: Defines the directory that will contain the output of release notes creation.

property.name: releasenotes.props
property.description: Property file with customer values

property.name: releasenotes.scan2log
property.description: Location of scan2log HTML file

property.name: releasenotes.temp.errors
property.description: Temp file

property.name: releasenotes.temp.output
property.description: Temp file

property.name: releasenotes.temp.props
property.description: Temp file

property.name: releasenotes.temp.props2
property.description: Temp file

property.name: releasenotes.template
property.description: Defines the name of the release note template used.

property.name: rombuild.buildinfo.template
property.description: FMPP template to generate a buildinfo makefile.

property.name: rombuild.buildinfo.output
property.description: Location of the output file.

property.name: s60.delta.config.prefix
property.description: Define the prefix part of the configuration name that builds delta variant.

property.name: s60.getenv.trigger.location
property.description: Define the location of the trigger file that should be used by CI.

property.name: getenv.tool.location
property.description: Defines the location of the getenv.pl script.

property.name: src.dir
property.description: java source directory location for helium library

property.name: subcon.log.file
property.description: The path to the subcon ROMs log.

property.name: subcon.zips.dir
property.description: The directory where subcon zips are stored.

property.name: team
property.description: Used to specify which team configuration is being used. These configuration files are under /mc/mc_build/teams.

property.name: temp.build.dir
property.description: Directory to store temporary files generated during the process.

property.name: zip.ee.log.file
property.description: Defines log file where to record archiving of engineering english area.

property.name: zip.subcon.log.file
property.description: Defines log file where to record archiving of subcon environment.

property.name: zip.subcon_roms.log.file
property.description: The log file name for zipping subcon_roms.

property.name: zip.trace_roms.log.file
property.description: The log file name for zipping trace_roms.

property.name: zip.uda_roms.log.file
property.description: The log file name for zipping uda_roms.

property.name: zips.build.dir
property.description: This is the directory where build area is archived after the build has finished.

property.name: zips.flashfiles.dir
property.description: This is the directory where flash files are archived.

property.name: zips.loc.dir
property.description: This is the directory where build area is archived after the localisation.

property.name: zip.localised.log.file
property.description: The path to the localization zipping log file.

property.name: remote.builds.config.file
property.description: The path to the configuration file for remote builds.

property.name: local.free.space
property.description: The amount of free space needed on the build machine in Mbs.

property.name: network.free.space
property.description: Amount of free space in MBs needed on the network drive where the build is published. The ``network.drive`` drive property must also be defined.

property.name: network.drive
property.description: The drive letter of a substed drive that maps to the network location where the build is published.

property.name: ec.build.class
property.description: Build class for Electric Cloud. No default value.

property.name: sbs.tools.config
property.description: tools configuration to be built

property.name: sbs.implicit.tools.build
property.description: uses tools config to be built before building the actual configuration.

property.name: sysdef.clean.configurations.list
property.description: Comma-separated list of System Definition configuration names to be built in the ido-prep-clean stage. If not defined the sysdef.configurations.list will be used to generate that configuration list.

property.name: sysdef.configurations.list
property.description: Comma-separated list of System Definition configuration names to be built in the compile-main stage.

property.name: compile.symbianos
property.description: Property must be set if the Symbian System Definition file is included in a build, in order to do full build from source.

property.name: publish.subdir
property.description: Subdir part of the publish dir, relative to publish.root.dir

property.name: error.email.to.list
property.description: List of email addresses where email is sent in case of build failure. No default value

property.name: release.dir.root
property.description: This is the directory which points to release-directory root.

property.name: enabled.ats
property.description: Value must be set to execute ats-test target. for example, 'value="1"'

property.name: enabled.aste
property.description: Value must be set to execute ats-aste target. for example, 'value="1"'

property.name: eunit.prepare.zip
property.description: Name of eunit zip file. Need to unzip into build area to start eunit test

property.name: core.build.version
property.description: This Defaults to the ${major.version}.${minor.version} combo and is available so that 1 number can be used (dot can be removed)

property.name: major.version
property.description: Part of a version information that is used to differentiate a build. Major version is the part that changes less frequently. Ie. year.

property.name: minor.version
property.description: Part of a version information that is used to differentiate a build. Minor version is the part that changes more frequntly. Ie week or a running number.

property.name: notes.database
property.description: The Notes database to do DCT5 upload to.

property.name: notes.release.dir
property.description: The DCT5 Release Notes SW Release Folder (where your build is Published to, so it can be obtained from there.)

property.name: notes.server
property.description: Lotus notes server name

property.name: prep.config.file
property.description: Defines configuration file used in prep-copy target. The file defines how files are copied and extracted into build area.

property.name: prep.delivery.file
property.description: Defines configuration file used in synergy operations (ccm-get-input for example). This file contains definition of projects that are checkouted or snapshotted.

property.name: product.family
property.description: In product builds defines the product family that the build product belong to.

property.name: product.list
property.description: In product builds defines the list of products that are build in the configuration. Property is used in rom image creation, localisation release notes creation and data packaging.

property.name: product.printname
property.description: A printable name for a product used in release notes.

property.name: product.type
property.description: Project ID in release notes.

property.name: publish
property.description: Defines whether the build content will be published to the network.

property.name: is.published
property.description: The value is either true or false depending on whether the publish property is set or not.

property.name: publish.root.dir
property.description: Defines the root directory of publish feature. Should point into the root of the folder that will contain published nightly builds/releases.

property.name: releasenotes.logo
property.description: Defines the logo image file which will be used in release notes.

property.name: relnotes.config.dir
property.description: Defines the directory that contains release notes creation configuration files.

property.name: sis.config.file
property.description: Configuration file for SIS-file generation.

property.name: sis.config.name
property.description: Common Configuration config name. Override to select a specific config group.

property.name: sms.number
property.description: sms numbers to report error or build information.

property.name: src
property.description: Source location for junit test class

property.name: src.classes
property.description: Java source files location for helium library

property.name: rombuild.config.file.parsed
property.description: Locates the parsed configuration for ROM builds.

property.name: ee.rom.output.dir
property.description: /output/development_flash_images/engineering_english/logs

property.name: core.rom.output.dir
property.description: /output/release_flash_images/rnd/core

property.name: selge.ini.network.dir
property.description: \\\\vcfiler02\\pub\\flash_user\\Crashbin/working\\selge_ini_prep

property.name: unix.username
property.description: Unix username.

property.name: unix.username.available
property.description: Equal 0 if the unix username if available

property.name: unix.password
property.description: Unix password

property.name: zips.ee.spec.name
property.description: the value should be "ee"

property.name: zip.config.file
property.description: Path to the the zip specification file

property.name: zip.config.file.parsed
property.description: Path to the parsed file of zip specification file

property.name: unix.password.available
property.description: Equal 0 if the unix password if available

property.name: failonerror
property.description: failonerror attribute for exec

property.name: flash.config.enabled
property.description: Define that property to enable config file generation.

property.name: compile.signal.input
property.description: Name of the signal input to be able to override the compile-main target.

property.name: compile.sysdef.dtd.stub
property.description: compile.sysdef.dtd.stub

property.name: ec.mem.limit
property.description: memory limit for EC execution. See user guide for more details

property.name: archive.using.ec
property.description: Set to true to enable EC zipping

property.name: build.drive.notdefined
property.description: used to track if build.drive has predefined or not

property.name: ado.mapping.file
property.description: Path to a INI file that contains the mapping between the ADO from Synergy WA and it's location on the BA.

property.name: ado.quality.mapping.file
property.description: Path to a INI file that contains the mapping between the ADO from Synergy WA and it's location on the BA for quality targets.

property.name: ido.romtree
property.description: Path to the build romtree; the location contains iby files. Default value is "${build.drive}${env.EPOCROOT}/epoc32/rom/include"

property.name: ido.cenrep.root
property.description: Path to the cenrep root. Default value is "${build.drive}${env.EPOCROOT}/epoc32/tools/cenrep/ido/src"

property.name: ido.cenrep.target
property.description: Path to the cenrep target directory. Default value is "${build.drive}${env.EPOCROOT}/epoc32/data/z/private/10202be9"

property.name: s60.build.robot.date
property.description:
This property represent the releasing interval. The syntax is as follow: day1,time1,day2,time2,projectname;day1,time1,day2,time2,projectname2
With day and time matching the following properties: day [1, 14] time [00, 23]:[00, 59]
Example: 2,10:00,3,20:00,ABS_domain

property.name: s60.build.robot.path
property.description: Location where to publish the build robot delivery.

property.name: validate.properties.at.startup
property.description: display warnings at build startup if required properties are not defined.

property.name: tracing.csv.file
property.description: Path location for the memory tracing data captured by the TracingLogger.

property.name: imagetool.cfg.xml.parsed
property.description: Locates the parsed configuration for ImageTool in the build directory.

property.name: imagetool.destination
property.description: Location where to copy ImageTool and definitions.

property.name: imagetool.images
property.description: Defines comma separated list of image names.

property.name: imagetool.log
property.description: Defines name of the ImageTool log file.

property.name: imagetool.output.dir
property.description: Defines the location of ImageTool output files.

property.name: imagetool.tooldir
property.description: Defines the location of ImageTool.

property.name: read.build.int
property.description: This must be set to enable reading the build.number from a text database file located on the network. It allows automated build number incrementing.

property.name: build.int.db.dir
property.description: The directory where the build integer database text files are stored.

property.name: create.bom.workarea.root
property.description: Your synergy work area directory (Set as the parent of the helium dir by default)

property.name: validate.policy.csv
property.description: Location of the CSV file that defines policy IDs.

property.name: validate.policy.ignoreroot
property.description: Skip the validation of the given root folders.

property.name: validate.policy.log
property.description: Location validate policy xml log.

property.name: validate.policy.log.xml
property.description: Location of the LogXML output file.

property.name: validate.policy.pattern
property.description: Comma separated list of pattern for policy validation. Defualt value is, distribution.policy.s60,distribution.policy

property.name: internal.api.config
property.description: Location of the config to parse the build content.

property.name: internal.api.output.prebuild
property.description: Location of the prebuild ado header content.

property.name: internal.api.output.postbuild
property.description: Location of the postbuild ado header content.

property.name: required.ant.version
property.description: The version of Apache Ant required by Helium.

property.name: sbs.hlm.scanlog
property.description: Enable helium scanlog for raptor. (experimental temporary solution)

property.description: Location of ivy jar.

property.name: logging.output.file

property.name: database.file

property.name: ci.project.config
property.description: Location of the configuration that will be generated for the Cruise Control HLMSynergy modificationset.
